mapper.update:
update model
model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update model set model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_account = #{payAccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from model order by pay_account desc
select IFNULL(sum(account),0) from model where model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
